; Purpose
* [[Property description::Contains the solvent volume used in an experiment or molecular process.@en]]

; Datatype
* [[Has type::Quantity]].

; Values
* Input fields should be restricted to positive numbers (<nowiki>regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/</nowiki>).

; Corresponds
* [[Corresponds to::1 ml]]
* [[Corresponds to::0.001 l]]

; Unit
* [[Display units::ml]]
